name: Priya Sharma
medical_history: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (diagnosed 5 years ago, controlled with oral medication)
Hypertension (diagnosed 3 years ago, controlled with medication)
Dyslipidemia (elevated LDL cholesterol, managed with statin)
Osteoarthritis in knees (mild, exacerbated by weight)
Family history of cardiovascular disease
dietary_restrictions: No specific food allergies reported
Prefers vegetarian meals, occasional consumption of eggs and fish
Reports difficulty limiting sugary beverages and processed snacks
goal: Achieve a 10-15% reduction in current body weight over 6-9 months to improve glycemic control, blood pressure, lipid profile, and reduce knee pain. Develop sustainable healthy eating habits and increase physical activity.

name: Rajesh Kumar
medical_history: Sleep Apnea (CPAP user)
Gout (recurrent flares, on allopurinol)
Fatty Liver Disease (diagnosed via ultrasound)
History of failed weight loss attempts with fad diets
dietary_restrictions: Avoids red meat due to gout
Dislikes most vegetables
Frequent consumption of high-calorie takeout meals
goal: Achieve a 15-20% weight loss to improve sleep apnea symptoms, reduce gout flares, and mitigate fatty liver progression. Focus on portion control, balanced macronutrient intake, and incorporating more nutrient-dense foods.

name: Sarah Khan
medical_history: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) - irregular periods, hirsutism
Insulin Resistance
Depression (managed with medication, reports emotional eating)
dietary_restrictions: No known allergies
Craves sugary foods and refined carbohydrates
Struggles with consistent meal timings due to work schedule
goal: Achieve a 5-10% weight loss to improve PCOS symptoms and insulin sensitivity. Develop a consistent meal plan, learn strategies to manage emotional eating, and increase physical activity.

name: Amit Patel
medical_history: Coronary Artery Disease (post-stent placement 2 years ago)
Chronic Kidney Disease (Stage 3)
GERD (on PPI medication)
Sedentary lifestyle due to joint pain
dietary_restrictions: Low sodium diet recommended due to hypertension and CAD
Protein restriction might be necessary for CKD (pending nephrologist's guidance)
Avoids spicy and acidic foods due to GERD
goal: Achieve a 10% weight loss to reduce cardiovascular risk and improve joint pain. Implement a heart-healthy and kidney-friendly diet (as per recommendations), focusing on nutrient timing and gentle physical activity.

name: Deepa Singh
medical_history: Hypothyroidism (on levothyroxine, stable)
Post-partum weight retention (gave birth 1 year ago)
Stress and lack of time for meal preparation
dietary_restrictions: No specific restrictions, but seeks convenient healthy options
Struggles with late-night snacking
Breastfeeding currently (needs adequate caloric intake for lactation)
goal: Achieve a gradual and sustainable weight loss of 0.5-1 kg/week while maintaining milk supply. Focus on practical meal planning, mindful eating, and incorporating physical activity into a busy schedule.

name: Vikram Reddy
medical_history: Pre-diabetes (elevated fasting glucose and HbA1c)
High Cholesterol (borderline elevated, not on medication)
Works a desk job with long hours, limited physical activity
dietary_restrictions: Frequent consumption of restaurant food during lunch
Enjoys sugary drinks and desserts daily
Not accustomed to cooking at home
goal: Prevent progression to Type 2 Diabetes by achieving a 7-10% weight loss. Learn to make healthier food choices when eating out, reduce sugar intake, and gradually incorporate regular physical activity.

name: Meena Devi
medical_history: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
Osteoporosis (on calcium and vitamin D supplements)
Limited mobility due to age and respiratory issues
dietary_restrictions: Difficulty chewing some tougher foods
Prefers soft, easy-to-digest meals
Experiences early satiety
goal: Improve respiratory function and mobility through a modest weight loss of 5-7%. Focus on nutrient-dense, easily digestible foods, small frequent meals, and gentle exercises to maintain muscle mass.

name: Arjun Das
medical_history: No significant medical history other than obesity
Sedentary lifestyle, spends most of the day gaming
Heavy consumption of fast food and sugary drinks
dietary_restrictions: Very picky eater, limited variety of fruits and vegetables consumed
Prefers processed snacks and convenience foods
Drinks several liters of soda daily
goal: Achieve a significant weight loss of 15-20% to prevent future health complications. Educate on basic nutrition principles, gradually introduce healthier food choices, and motivate for increased physical activity.

name: Pooja Gupta
medical_history: Family history of Type 2 Diabetes
Low self-esteem related to weight
Experiences bullying at school
dietary_restrictions: Frequent consumption of school canteen food and peer influence on food choices
Reports skipping breakfast, large dinner portions
High intake of packaged snacks and sugary drinks
goal: Achieve a healthy weight for age and height to improve self-esteem and reduce future health risks. Educate on healthy eating for adolescents, promote balanced meals, and encourage participation in physical activities she enjoys.

name: Gautam Iyer
medical_history: Chronic Back Pain (due to disc bulge, exacerbated by weight)
Borderline High Blood Pressure
History of heartburn
Reports high stress levels leading to overeating
dietary_restrictions: Eats large portions, especially during dinner
Frequent snacking on fried foods and sweets
Works irregular shifts, leading to erratic meal timings
goal: Achieve a 10-12% weight loss to alleviate back pain and manage borderline hypertension. Implement strategies for stress-related eating, portion control, and healthier food choices during irregular work hours.
